attributes.title: App is as terrible as the person
attributes.review: The App is as terrible as the person

attributes.title: Disgusting!
attributes.review: This app was horribly put together! I opened the app to support my beautiful president who’s not racist, homophobic, transphobic, sexist at ALL. This app wasn’t good enough for me, the way it was put together was just HORRIBLE. I actually almost threw up when it asked me for my phone number! MY PHONE NUMBER! I didn’t consent for the app to ask me such a personal question like my own phone number! This app literally disrespected me on the highest level.

attributes.title: Do not get this app.
attributes.review: It’s bad. He’s bad. We need a new president. We need a new system. Go vote.

attributes.title: Trump should die
attributes.review: If trump died I would throw a party, Kanye west would be a better president then Trump

attributes.title: Daveed Diggs Said It Better
attributes.review: Took forever to download, I can’t believe some of my favorite creators recommended this app for me?! It spews hate and spreads ignorance to my other apps. 0/10

attributes.title: honestly just. no❤️.
attributes.review: this app is totally nasty it’s infested with rats and beetles and although the rats were very friendly the beetles were not. they body shamed me bc they said my ass was just too darn juicy. plz don’t get it unless you want to be shamed for having a juicy ass😔
